# `_quarto.yml` {background-color='{{< brand color yellow >}}' background-image='../../img/background-hex-shapes.svg' background-opacity='0.5'}


## `_quarto.yml`

Configure all site-level settings with `_quarto.yml`:

```{.yaml filename="_quarto.yml"}
project:
  type: website

website:
  title: "My site"
  navbar:
    left:
      - href: index.qmd
        text: Home

format:
  html:
    toc: true
```

## Project settings

```{.yaml filename="_quarto.yml" code-line-numbers="3|4-5"}
project:
  type: website
  output-dir: _output
  preview:
    port: 5555
```

## Project settings

```{.yaml filename="_quarto.yml" code-line-numbers="4-5"}
project:

  preview:
    port: 5555
```

![](img/preview-port.png){fig-align="center"}

## Site settings

```{.yaml filename="_quarto.yml" code-line-numbers="6-8"}
project:
  type: website

website:
  title: "My site"
  description: "Some neat stuff"
  cookie-consent: true
  search: false
  navbar:
    left:
      - href: index.qmd
        text: Home

format:
  html:
    toc: true
```

## Navigation settings

More on this in a bit!

```{.yaml filename="_quarto.yml" code-line-numbers="6-13"}
project:
  type: website

website:
  title: "My site"
  navbar:
    left:
      - href: index.qmd
        text: Home
  sidebar: 
    style: "docked"
    contents: 
      - about.qmd

format:
  html:
    toc: true
```

## Format settings

```{.yaml filename="_quarto.yml" code-line-numbers="11-15"}
project:
  type: website

website:
  title: "My site"
  navbar:
    left:
      - href: index.qmd
        text: Home

format:
  html:
    toc: true
    number-sections: true
    cap-location: margin
```
